lines: It is often in the darkest skies that we see the brightest stars. #<Author:0x00007fcdfbc42810>
Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future. #<Author:0x00007fcdfbc421d0>
Hope sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible. #<Author:0x00007fcdfbc41a50>
The essence of life is not in the great victories and grand failures, but in the simple joys. #<Author:0x00007fce088aec50>
The joy of giving is the greatest joy of life. #<Author:0x00007fce088adc10>
Happiness—not in another place, but this place... not for another hour, but for this hour. #<Author:0x00007fce088ad490>
Joy is the kind of happiness that doesn’t depend on what happens. #<Author:0x00007fce088acf90>
If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment. #<Author:0x00007fce088aca90>
Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.  #<Author:0x00007fce088abf50>
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work. #<Author:0x00007fce088aaf10>
When you start to develop your powers of empathy and imagination, the whole world opens up to you. #<Author:0x00007fce088aa8d0>
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be. #<Author:0x00007fce088aa010>
When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too. #<Author:0x00007fce088a9890>
Practice like you’ve never won. Play like you’ve never lost. #<Author:0x00007fce088a9390>
Practice is the best of all instructors. #<Author:0x00007fce088a8710>
Talent is a pursued interest. Anything that you’re willing to practice, you can do. #<Author:0x00007fce088a7950>
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is practice. #<Author:0x00007fce088a6550>
Practice creates confidence. Confidence empowers you. #<Author:0x00007fce088a5790>
No one has ever become poor by giving. #<Author:0x00007fce088a5010>
The more generous we are, the more joyous we become. #<Author:0x00007fce088a35d0>
Sometimes when we are generous in small, barely detectable ways it can change someone else's life forever. #<Author:0x00007fce088a2bd0>
The greatest gift you ever give is your honest self. #<Author:0x00007fce088a1550>
Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others. #<Author:0x00007fce088a0b50>
The more grateful I am, the more beauty I see. #<Author:0x00007fce088a0650>
As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them. #<Author:0x00007fcdfb8cfca0>
Showing gratitude is one of the simplest yet most powerful things humans can do for each other. #<Author:0x00007fcdfb8cf160>
Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart. #<Author:0x00007fcdfb8ce760>
Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. #<Author:0x00007fcdfb8cdfe0>
Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. Today is a gift. #<Author:0x00007fcdfb8cc820>
Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory. #<Author:0x00007fcdfb8ca8e0>
The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it. #<Author:0x00007fcdfb8c8720>
Appreciation is a wonderful thing. It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well. #<Author:0x00007fcdfb8c7be0>
What counts can’t always be counted; what can be counted doesn’t always count. #<Author:0x00007fcdfb8c75a0>
